abilities.name: Knight Champion of Macragge
abilities.rule: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this model, if this model’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

abilities.name: Lead From the Front
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Scouts 6" ability and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[ASSAULT]** ability.
